data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achterberg, Cornelis van, Long, Khuat Dang, Chen, Xue-xin, You, Lan-shao (2015): Pseudofornicia gen. n. (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae), a new Indo-Australian genus and one new species from Vietnam. ZooKeys 524: 89-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.524.6158, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.524.6158
